channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Japanese AI SaaS Startup LayerX Raises $100 Million In Series B
item.description: The round drew participation from Japanese banking giant Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group and local venture capital firm JAFCO Group, among others.

item.title: Google Issues Critical Update For All 2.5 Billion Gmail Users
item.description: Don’t believe the headlines, Google says, as it tells users how to protect their accounts.
